author: uink45
content: Hey <@881905303011086387>, are Libp2p light clients expected to publish the gossip topics `light_client_finality_update` and `light_client_optimistic_update` assuming the objects pass the validation rules or it is only full nodes that are supposed to publish?

author: etan_status
content:
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/specs/altair/light-client/p2p-interface.md#light_client_finality_update
Light client rules are specified here.
> [IGNORE] The finality_update advances the finalized_header of the local LightClientStore
If the finality_update is valid and advances `store.finalized_header.beacon.slot` the update is re-published (accept), otherwise it's ignored.
